1211820.name: Bokuten - Kick Start Generation OVA + Album
1211820.description:
A digital anime featuring the characters from KIRAKIRA, DEARDROPS, and Bokuten performing a concert!

Features

- Video Resolution: 1920 x 1080
- Duration: 26 min
- Englished subtitled

Bonus Digital Tracks

Features the songs played during this anime concert (+Bonus tracks) in loss-less FLAC and mp3!

01. BOWPEEP!! (CaS)
02. MyDear (DEARDROPS)
03. High and High (DEARDROPS)
04. LIFE=LOVE=LIVE (DEARDROPS)
05. Toughness (DEARDROPS)
06. Da!Da!Da! (d2b)
07. Let's Go On a Mystery Tour (d2b)
08. Let's go wild! (d2b)
09. To You (d2b)
10. KIRAKIRA_ALLSTARS (d2b)
